overview: Sometimes no matter how messed up a person is, if they're hot enough, they're more than good enough. It's the night of the dance and the school gym is alive with excitement.  Everyone is there, even Carrie, the girl no one likes. the girl who lives in the old house with her creepy step dad. The girl with the strange powers.  But tonight no one will laugh at Carrie.
tagline: They're All Gonna Cum On You!
title: Orgy University
